CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- GameStart 모델에서 사용하는 컴포넌트 -- Lobby 중앙 포탈 엔티티를 클릭하면 동작

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTouchReleaseEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters --------------------------------------------------------
local GameStartPanel = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/GameStartUI/GameStartPanel") local DBUpgradeInfo = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DBUpgradeUI/DBUpgradeInfo") local GameMatchingPanel = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/GameMatchingUI/GameMatchingPanel")
if DBUpgradeInfo.Visible == false and GameMatchingPanel.Visible == false then GameStartPanel:SetVisible(true) GameStartPanel:SetEnable(true) end
